home.content: This is a multilingual website. You can navigate to the Settings and select your preferred language from the dropdown menu to change the content of the website. We offer three English, Hindi, Spanish. Simply choose your desired language, and the website's content will adapt accordingly.
home.title: Home

about.content: This is an assignment for the role React developer, supports multiple languages, currently supports only English, Spanish, Hindi. Made by Sambari Vignesh, vigneshsambari1901@gmail.com!
about.title: About
